A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I liked the movie well enough on the first viewing\, aside from the writer's take on Luke Skywalker.  However\, I found very little to delight in while rewatching The Last Jedi.  What is Star Wars for\, if not to bring joy through cinematic storytelling?  The visuals\, music\, and casting we're all fantastic\, but the story could be improved on.
